title: Forbes ranking of the 10 richest people in Italy 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The highest Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has 21.1 more Wealth in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Ennio Doris.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The maximum Wealth in billion U.S. dollars 24.4 is found at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and the minimum is found at Ennio Doris where Month is 3.3.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The highest Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has 21.1 more Wealth in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Ennio Doris.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The highest Month Leonardo Del Vecchio has 21.1 more Wealth in billion U.S. dollars than the lowest Month Ennio Doris.
Wealth in billion U.S. dollars at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio is 24.4 , second place is Giovanni Ferrero at 21.9, and thirdly is Giorgio Armani at 11.2.
Over the past 10 Months, the Wealth in billion U.S. dollars has reduced.
The highest value 24.4 at Leonardo Del Vecchio is almost 2.43 times larger than the average value 10.03.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is 100.3 if we add up values of all Months.
